51:50: Basi (mwasalilani yanti): “Tililani kwa Allah, chisimu une (Muhammadi ﷺ) kukwenu ni nkutetela jwakuonechela jwakuuma Kukwakwe.”
51:51: “Soni ngasim’biika pamo ni Allah nnungu jwine, chisimu une (Muhammadi ﷺ) kukwenu ni nkutetela jwakuonechela jwakuuma Kukwakwe.”
51:52: Iyyoyopeyo (yaakuti pakuntenda mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ kuti nsaŵi kapena jwamasoka), nganijwaichilileje aŵala ŵapaujo pao ntenga jwalijose ikaŵeje ŵanganyao ŵatiji: “(Aju ni) nsaŵi kapena jwamasoka.”
51:53: Ana ate kulechelana gele (maloŵega)? (Ngwamba), nambo ŵanganyao ni ŵandu ŵakusumba mpika (pa ukafili)
51:54: Basi mwatundumalilani ŵanganyao (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ), soni mmwe ngam’ba ŵagambidwa (nkwatundumalilamo)
51:55: Soni kumbusyani, basi chisimu kumbusya tikwakamuchisye ŵakulupilila
51:56: Soni nganingamba gumba majini ni ŵandu ikaŵeje kuti angalagatileje Une (Jikape)
51:57: Ngangusaka kuumila kukwao lisiki, soni ngangusaka kuti andiisyeeje (kapena kuliisya iwumbe Yangu)
51:58: Chisimu Allah ni Nkupeleka lisiki nnope, Nsyene machili gakulimbangana
51:59: Sano chisimu akwete kupata aŵala ŵalitendele lupuso chipande cha ilagasyo chanti mpela chipande chailagasyo cha achimijao (ŵakala), basi ngasanjanguya (kuti napeje ilagasyoyo ndaŵi jakwe nkanijikwane)
51:60: Basi ipotesi tiyichiŵa kwa aŵala ŵaakufuulu pa lisiku lyao alila lyaakupedwa chilanga (cha kwika kwakwe)
52:1: Ngulilumbila litumbi (lyaŵam’bechetakasyisye Allah Musa lyalili ku Sinayi)
52:4: Ni Al-Bait-ul-Ma‘mȗr (Nyumba jajili kumawunde mwakulondana ni Likaaba, jaakujijaulilaga Achimalaika mwakuŵilinganya)
52:7: Chisimu ilagasyo ya Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) iŵele yakupatikana kwene
52:9: Lisiku lyalichitenganyika liwunde ni ntenganyiko wamachili
52:10: Ni gachijenda matumbi ni kajende kaluŵilo
52:11: Basi ipotesi lyele lisikulyo taachiipata ŵakanila
52:12: Aŵala ŵaakuŵa nkung’anda mu yangali mate
52:13: Lisiku lyatachitutilidwa ku moto wa Jahannama katutilidwe kamachili
52:14: (Ni tachisalilidwa yanti): “Awu ni Moto awula wamwaliji nkuwukaanila.”
52:16: “Ujinjilani (ni kupasya kupoteka kwakwe), pililani kapena nkapilila yalumope kukwenu, chisimu nkulipidwa yamwaliji nkupanganya.”
52:17: Chisimu ŵawoga (wakun’jogopa Allah) tachiŵa m’Matimbe ga ku Mbepo, ni chindimba
52:18: Achiyisengwelaga yaŵapele M’mbuje gwao (Allah), aku M’mbuje gwao ali ŵagosile ku ilagasyo ya Moto Waukali
52:19: (Tachasalila kuti): “Lyagani soni mwagani mwakusengwa ligongo lya ayila (yambone) yamwaliji nkutenda.”
52:20: Ali ajegeme mu itengu yauchimbichimbi yejalidwe chenene, ni tuchalombekasya ni achimmasyeto ŵameso gakulanguka soni gekulungwa mwakusalalila
52:21: Sano aŵala ŵaakulupilile ni kwaakuuya ŵanache ŵao pa chikulupi, chitukasimanganye ŵanganyao ni ŵanache ŵao, soni ngatuja kwapunguchisya (malipilo ga) masengo gao chilichose. Mundu jwalijose tachiŵa uwombosi wakuliombolela ku (yakusakala) yaŵapanganyisye (pakutaŵidwa ku Moto)
52:22: Ni tukaajonjechesyeje (ŵakulupililao ndaŵi ni katema) isogosi kwisa soni nyama, mu yataakaisacheje
52:23: Takapochelanganeje kwalakweko ipanda (yankologo) wangatendekasya kuŵecheta yangali mate namuno yasambi
52:24: Ni taakaasyuunguleje ŵanganyao achiboyi ŵao (ŵakwatumichila), gamba kuŵa ŵanganyao (kamelemende kakwe) nti chisawu ngalekale syesunjidwe
52:25: Ni tachigalauchilana ŵane kwa ŵane achiwusyanaga (yatite kawupate ntendele wa ku Mbepo)
52:26: Tachiti: “Chisimu uwwe twaliji kala ku maŵasa getu tuli nkogopa (ipotesi ya Allah).”
52:27: “Basi Allah atutendele ukoto uwwe ni atugosile ku ilagasyo ya Moto.”
52:28: “Chisimu uwwe twaliji kala (ku duniya) tuli nkum’bomba (Jwele Jikape), chisimu Jwalakwe ni Jwambone nnope, Jwachanasa channope.”
52:29: Basi kumbusyani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ), soni mmwe nganim’ba abimbi kapena ŵamasoka pa chindimba cha Ambuje ŵenu (champele, wauli utume)
52:30: Kapena ŵanganyao akutiji: “(Jwalakweju ni) nkwiimba ilaanga, tugamba kun’jembechela kuti chimpate chiwa (yachatite pakwapata akwiimba ŵane ŵaakala)?”
52:31: Jilani: “Jembechelaani, chisimu une none ndinamwe mwa akwembecheya.”
52:32: Kapena lunda lwao ni lwalukwalamulila yalakweyi, kapena agambile kuŵa ŵandu ŵakusumba mpika
52:33: Kapena akutiji: “Jwalakwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) ni jwaajituunjile (Qur’aniji)?” (Ngwamba), nambo kuti ŵanganyao ngaakukulupilila
52:34: Basi ayiche najo abali janti mpela jalakweji (Qur’an), naŵaga jamanjao akuŵecheta yakuona
52:35: Kapena ŵagumbidwe mwangali chilichose (chakwagumba), kapena ŵanganyao ni ŵaŵaligumbile (achimisyene)
52:36: Kapena ŵanganyao ni ŵaŵagumbile mawunde ni mataka? (Ngwamba), nambo kuti ngakusimichisya (ya ilagasyo ya Allah)
52:37: Kapena akwete ŵanganyao imatiilo ya Ambuje ŵenu (Allah), kapena ŵanganyao ni ŵaakwete machili gakutendela yaakusaka
52:38: Kapena akwete makwelelo (gakwelela kwinani) ni akupikanilaga pa galakwego (yakuŵecheta Achimalaika kwinaniko)? Basi ayiche naotu akupikanila ŵaowo umboni wakuonechela
52:39: Kapena Jwalakwe (Allah) ni jukwete ŵanache ŵachikongwe, sano jenumanja ni nkwete ŵanache ŵachilume
52:40: Kapena mmwe (Muhammadi ﷺ) nkwajuga ŵanganyao malipilo, sano jamanjao ni akusitopelwa nasyo ngongole
52:41: Kapena akwete ŵanganyao (ilimu) yakusisika, basi ŵanganyao ni akulemba (yalakweyo)
52:42: Kapena akusaka kutenda maliindi? Basi aŵala ŵaakufuulu ni ŵali ŵakwaujila malindi gao
52:43: Kapena akwete ŵanganyao nnungu jwine jwangaŵaga Allah? Aswejele Allah ku yaakum'bwanganya nayo
52:44: Namuno angachione chipande cha liwunde chinankugwa (kukwao kwakuli kwika kwa ipotesi), angatite: “(Aga ni) mawunde gawula gagakamatene (ngaŵa kwika kwa ipotesi).”
52:45: Basi mwalekaani, mpaka tasimangane nalyo lisiku lyao alila lyatachikomoka kwa kuwa mu lyalakwelyo
52:46: Lisiku lyaangaakamuchisya malindi gao chilichose, soni ŵanganyao ngasakulupusyidwa
52:47: Soni chisimu akwete kupata aŵala ŵaatesile lupuso (ligongo lya ukafili wao) ilagasyo (ine pa duniya pano) nkaniyiŵe yalakweyo (ya ku Akhera), nambo ŵajinji mwa ŵanganyao ngakumanyilila
52:48: Basi chijembecheyaani mwakupilila (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chilamusi cha Ambuje ŵenu (Allah), basi chisimu mmwe nkuloleledwa ni meso Getu, ni lluswejesyeje lumbili lwa Ambuje ŵenu (Allah) ndema jankwiimuka (kuumila llugono kapena pamalo palipose)
52:49: Nombe soni chilo lluswejesyeje (lumbili lwa Ambuje ŵenu), ni pakutiŵila ndondwa (kumasikusiku)
53:4: Nganigaŵa galakwego ikaŵeje maloŵe gakuuwula gagakuuwulidwa

57:1: Iŵele ili nkunswejesya Allah Yosope yaili kumawunde ni petaka, soni Jwalakwe ni Jwamachili gakupunda, Jwalunda lwakusokoka
